attributes.action: Try and convince government and the train services that there is a high demand for two late night trains back along the Skipton line one at 1.30am and the other at 3am.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people from up and down the Skipton train line enjoy a good night out in Leeds every Friday and Saturday night. The only trouble is the night has to be cut short to catch the last train back. On a Friday and Saturday currently the last train running back along the Skipton line stopping at Shipley, Saltaire, Bingley, Crossflatts, Keighley, Steeton & Silsden, Cononley and finally Skipton is 23:18.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Try and convince government and the train services that there is a high demand for two late night trains back along the Skipton line one at 1.30am and the other at 3am."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17069


Prime Minister's Office
